choices.text:
Write an email to my boss letting them know I am leaving the company
Dear [Boss's Name],
I hope this message finds you well. It is with a heavy heart that I must inform you of my decision to leave the company. My last working day will be [last working date].
I have enjoyed my time here and appreciate all the opportunities given to me during my tenure. I am grateful for the support, guidance, and friendship provided by my colleagues and superiors alike.
I wish you and the company continued success in the future. Please let me know if there is anything I can do to assist with the transition process.
Thank you once again for everything.
Sincerely,
[Your Name]
